amendatorysection.catchline: Stay of execution; expiration; writ to issue; duty of clerk.
amendatorysection.para: At the expiration of the stay the clerk shall issue a joint execution against the property of all the judgment debtors and sureties, describing them as debtors or sureties therein.

annotation.para: Mandamus will lie to compel issuance of execution against both principal and sureties. State ex rel. Thorn v. Fleming, 21 Neb. 321, 32 N.W. 73 (1887).
